overview: The war of the Helio-Constellar sisters is reaching its peak. As the sun nation, lead by Scorpiids 55.2, is threatened to perish, Hephaestus, the God of fire, naturally born as a member of the sun tribe, is plagued by prophetic dreams in which Ahianmwen-oro, the bird of prophecy, shows him the future.
title: Hephaestus jadid
